content: double stitch work as set to one stitch before the double wrapped stitch make the german double stitch from the last unworked stitch or wrap that stitch turn r4 backward slip the double stitch work as set to one stitch before the double wrapped stitch make the german double stitch from the last unworked stitch or wrap that stitch turn repeat r3 and r4 until you have 12 13 double wrapped stitches at both sides work all double stitches except the first one as set that is knit the knits and purl the purls or work wrapped stitches as set without undoing wraps work needle 2 in pattern work the first double stitch on needle 1 work stitches as set work needle 2 in pattern now continue with short row heel r1 forward work stitches as set until 12 13 stitches are left on the left needle make the german double stitch from the next stitch or wrap that stitch turn 6 r2 backward slip the double stitch work stitches as set until 12 13 stitches are left on the left needle make the german double stitch from the next stitch or wrap that stitch turn r3 forward slip the double stitch work to the double/wrapped stitch as set work the double stitch as a single stitch as set or work as set the wrapped stitch without removing the wrap make the german double stitch from the next stitch or wrap that stitch turn r4 backward slip the double stitch work to the double/wrapped stitch as set work the double stitch as a single stitch as set or work the wrapped stitch as set without removing the wrap make the german double stitch from the next stitch or wrap that stitch turn r epeat r3 and r4 until all stitches are used feet continue working in the round work the sole stitches that is stitches on needle 1 as set decrease the 2 3 gusset stitches on needle 2 if the first stitch on the needle is knit ssk if it is a purl p2tog and continue in pattern as set to the last stitch if the last stitch is knit k2tog if it is a purl rearrange as for ssk and p2tog through the back loop work the next round as set repeat decreases until you have initial 35 40 stitches on needle 2 alternating between decrease round and the round without decreases wtooersk until the foot is 5 cm/2 inches shorter than desired length including toes the general rule for reversible decreases if the second stitch on the left needle is knit work ssk if the second stitch on the left needle is purl work p2tog if the stitch before the last stitch on the left needle is knit work k2tog if the stitch before the last stitch on the left needle is purl rearrange the stitches as in ssk and work p2tog through the back loop set up round work all stitches as set trh1e n continue
